2025-09-01.title: Easy Recovery Run
2025-09-01.details: Very easy conversational pace. Focus on relaxed form.

2025-09-02.title: Speed Introduction
2025-09-02.details: Gentle speed introduction. Strides at 4:50-5:10/km with full recovery walks. Focus on form and feeling fast.

2025-09-03.title: Optional Easy Run
2025-09-03.details: Only if feeling fresh. Conversational effort throughout.

2025-09-04.title: Tempo Introduction
2025-09-04.details: Comfortably hard effort. Should feel controlled and sustainable.

2025-09-06.title: Easy Recovery Run
2025-09-06.details: Very easy conversational pace. Focus on relaxed form.

2025-09-07.title: Long Run Build
2025-09-07.details: Steady aerobic effort. Practice race-day fueling and hydration.

2025-09-09.title: VO2 Max Intervals
2025-09-09.description: 2km easy warm-up + 5 × 800m (4:50-5:10/km) with 400m easy recovery + 2km cool-down
2025-09-09.details: Hard but controlled intervals. Recovery jogs should be truly easy.

2025-09-10.title: Optional Recovery Run
2025-09-10.details: Very easy if legs are tired. Skip if any soreness.

2025-09-11.title: Extended Tempo
2025-09-11.details: Sustained comfortably hard effort. Key workout for race preparation.

2025-09-14.title: Long Run
2025-09-14.details: Most important workout. Final 6km should feel controlled at race pace.

2025-09-16.title: Race Pace Intervals
2025-09-16.description: 2km easy warm-up + 4 × 1200m (5:35-5:40/km) with 600m easy recovery + 2km cool-down
2025-09-16.details: Race pace intervals. Focus on rhythm and breathing.

2025-09-17.title: Optional Shakeout
2025-09-17.details: Very gentle if needed. Include 4 × 50m strides if feeling good.

2025-09-18.title: Threshold Run
2025-09-18.details: Comfortably hard - the pace you could sustain for 15-20km.

2025-09-21.title: Long Run
2025-09-21.details: Steady aerobic effort. Slightly easier than race pace.

2025-09-23.title: Short Speed
2025-09-23.description: 2km easy warm-up + 6 × 300m (4:50-5:10/km) with 300m easy jog recovery + 2km cool-down
2025-09-23.details: Sharp but not all-out. Focus on leg turnover and efficiency.

2025-09-24.title: Optional Easy Run
2025-09-24.details: Only if feeling good. Keep it truly easy.

2025-09-25.title: Tempo Segments
2025-09-25.description: 2km easy + 3 × 2km tempo (5:15-5:30/km) with 1km easy between + 1km cool-down
2025-09-25.details: Broken tempo session. Each segment should feel strong and controlled.

2025-09-27.title: Pre-Race Simulation Shakeout
2025-09-27.details: Keep legs moving but fresh. Strides should feel effortless.  This is to get a feel for how it will feel before the race.

2025-09-28.title: Race Simulation
2025-09-28.description: 3km easy + 14km at race pace (5:35-5:40/km) + 3km easy cool-down
2025-09-28.details: Key confidence builder. 12km block should feel controlled and strong.

2025-09-30.title: Optional Shakeout
2025-09-30.details: Gentle shakeout to keep legs moving.

2025-10-01.title: Final Hard Session
2025-10-01.details: Last hard workout. Should feel controlled and confident.

2025-10-03.title: Easy Taper Run
2025-10-03.details: Easy effort with short pickups to stay sharp.

2025-10-05.title: Taper Long Run
2025-10-05.details: Easy overall effort with race pace segments for confidence.

2025-10-07.title: Short Tempo
2025-10-07.details: Short tempo to maintain feel for faster running without fatigue.

2025-10-09.title: Keep legs moving
2025-10-09.details: Very gentle if needed. Add in like 4-6x200m at race pace (5:35-5:40/km).

2025-10-11.title: Pre-Race Shakeout
2025-10-11.details: Keep legs moving but fresh. Strides should feel effortless.

2025-10-12.title: RACE DAY - Half Marathon
2025-10-12.details: Start at 5:45/km for first 5km, settle into 5:35-5:40/km, final 2km push if strong.
